campaigns section.header: With your efforts and participation, we will achieve the best for our country. Let's clean together!

campaigns data.name: Basra Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: Join us in the Basra Cleaning Campaign on Saturday in the Corniche area! Join us in the Basra Cleaning Campaign on Saturday in the Corniche area!

campaigns data.name: Baghdad Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: There's a cleaning campaign in Baghdad on Sunday in the Liberation Square area! There's a cleaning campaign in Baghdad on Sunday in the Liberation Square area!

campaigns data.name: Mosul Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: Join us on Monday in the streets of Mosul for a comprehensive cleaning campaign! Join now and participate in cleaning on Monday in the forest area!

campaigns data.name: Nasiriyah Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: Gather with us on Tuesday in Nasiriyah to start the city's cleaning campaign! Gather with us on Tuesday at the Nasiriyah Park.

campaigns data.name: Maysan Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: We invite you to join us on Wednesday for the Maysan Cleaning Campaign and make it more beautiful! We invite you to join us on Wednesday.

campaigns data.name: Diwaniyah Cleaning Campaign
campaigns data.description: Thursday is the start of the Diwaniyah Cleaning Campaign! Join to make the city cleaner and more beautiful. Thursday is the start of the Diwaniyah Cleaning Campaign!

governorate.label: Governorate
governorate.note: The governorate you will participate in cleaning this week (not necessarily the same as your residence)

form section.important note: Fill out this form to receive your barcode and use it at all Cleanliness Ambassadors gatherings.
form section.note: Note: If you prefer not to share your information, you can attend without filling out the form, but you won't receive any campaign materials (e.g., t-shirt, water bottle, medal, etc.).
